knimeNode.name: JavaScript FSK Simulation Configurator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates simulations for a FSK model.

fullDescription.intro: Generate simulations for a FSK model. The defaultSimulation settings created by the FSK creator and Editor are disabled by default. The simulation selected in the view is set as simulation to run in the runner node.
fullDescription.option:
The simulation names only take unique identifiers of type SId. The SId type follows the pattern:
letter ::= ’a’..’z’,’A’..’Z’
digit ::= ’0’..’9’
nameChar ::= letter | digit | ’_’
name ::= ( letter | ’_’ ) nameChar*
Values for all the parameters in the FSK model. Currently only real numbers are supported.
